word_mean_info__list.difference: 指广义的“图画”，现多用来指相片、画像。
通常指只画出物体主要特征的图画。
指插入书页之间帮助说明的任何插图或图解。
多指科技书籍或文献中具有概括解说作用的图表、图样或略图。
指用线条或色彩绘成的图画。

word_group.brief_definition: 工程制图；工程绘图；工程图
设计图纸；设计制图；设计草图

bilingual.source: Alex did lots of drawing as a little boy.
bilingual.target: 亚历克斯小时候画了很多画。

bilingual.source: He was drawing a comic strip called 'Super Bird'.
bilingual.target: 他正在画一部名为《超级鸟》的连环画。
诺拉最喜欢的爱好是画画。

bilingual.source: He was only happy when he was drawing.
bilingual.target: 他只有在画画时才开心。

bilingual.source: The children were drawing on their slates.
bilingual.target: 孩子们在他们的石板上画画。

bilingual.source: Drawing has an amazing effect on children.'
The rule is that there is no drawing in sand.
bilingual.target: 规则是不在沙子上画画。

yingyinNormal.en: What are you drawing over there?
yingyinNormal.zh: 你在画什么呢？

yingyinNormal.en: I'm drawing a pineapple. I'm drawing a carrot. Very good. What are you drawing, Emily? A pea.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我画了一个菠萝。我画了一根胡萝卜。画得很好。你画的是什么，艾米丽？一颗豆子。

yingyinNormal.en: Dora's real, for real? No, that's a drawing. Dora is a drawing.
yingyinNormal.zh: 真的吗？那朵拉也是真的吗？不，她是画出来的，朵拉是画出来的。

yingyinNormal.en: Peppa and George love drawing with coloring pens. I am drawing a house. George is drawing a dinosaur. George always draws dinosaurs.
yingyinNormal.zh: 佩奇和乔治喜欢用彩色笔来画画。我要画一间房子。乔治正在画一只恐龙，乔治最喜欢的就是画恐龙了。

yingyinNormal.en: Peppa and George love drawing with coloring pens. I am drawing a house. George is drawing a dinosaur. George always draws dinosaurs. Dinosaur.
yingyinNormal.zh: 佩奇和乔治喜欢用彩色笔来画画。我要画一间房子。乔治正在画一只恐龙，乔治最喜欢的就是画恐龙了。恐龙。

yingyinNormal.en: Drawing a woman's face is different than drawing a man's. Look for subtle differences. The lips are different.
yingyinNormal.zh: 画女人的脸跟画男人的脸不一样，有些微妙的差别，嘴唇就不一样。

yingyinNormal.en: I am drawing a football. I've drawn some flowers. Mr. Potato. A parrot. And I've drawn a muddy puddle.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我正在画一个足球。我要画一些花朵。我要画土豆先生。我画胡萝卜。我要在上面画一个泥坑。

yingyinNormal.en: You didn't cry when Bambi's mother died? Yes it was very sad when the guy stopped drawing the deer.
yingyinNormal.zh: 斑比的母亲死了你没哭？动画师不再画母鹿，的确很可怜。

yingyinNormal.en: Granny Pig is drawing the treasure map. Grandpa Pig is burying the treasure in a secret place in the garden.
yingyinNormal.zh: 猪奶奶在画藏宝图，猪爷爷正在把宝藏藏在花园里的一个秘密地点。

yingyinNormal.en: And this is a drawing of what needs to be built. I think something is missing, Daddy. There. Peppa has drawn a swing to go outside the house.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这个是设计怎么造房子的图稿。我觉得还少了一些东西。好了！佩奇在房子旁边画了一个秋千。

yingyinNormal.en: Ah? And this is a drawing of what needs to be built. I think something is missing, Daddy. There. Peppa has drawn a swing to go outside the house.
yingyinNormal.zh: 噢？这个是设计怎么造房子的图稿。我觉得还少了一些东西。好了！佩奇在房子旁边画了一个秋千。

yingyinNormal.en: My job is all about drawing shapes on the computer. Then I print the shapes out. And here's another copy. Thank you. What a nice job Mrs. Cat has.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我的工作就是在电脑上画各种各样的图形，然后再把这些图形打印出来。我这里还有另外一张。谢谢你，猫女士的工作也很不错。

yingyinNormal.en: My job is all about drawing shapes on the computer. Then I print the shapes out. And here's another copy. Thank you. What a nice job Mrs. Cat has.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我的工作就是在电脑上画各种各样的图形，然后再把这些图形打印出来。我这里还有另外一张。谢谢你，猫女士的工作也很不错。

yingyinNormal.en: Well, I like the pretty little drawing of you in the wedding dress. Thank you.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我喜欢你穿婚纱的图画。

yingyinNormal.en: Silly Daddy. That is just a drawing. Yes, now you must run to the real windy castle.
yingyinNormal.zh: 糊涂的爸爸！那个只是一幅画而已。没错，现在你需要跑向真正的风息堡了。

yingyinNormal.en: And I'm gonna really get in that brow action by just physically drawing the eyebrows.
yingyinNormal.zh: 接下来我通过画眉毛来开始画眉动作。

yingyinNormal.en: Can I get you anything? Is there anything you'd like? Yes. I would like to see my drawing.
yingyinNormal.zh: 请问您还需不需要什么? 有，我想看看我的画像。

yingyinNormal.en: Absolutely. She must have a thorough knowledge of music, singing, drawing, dancing and the modern languages, to deserve the word. And something in her air and manner of walking.
yingyinNormal.zh: 绝对。她必须非常精通音乐、歌唱、绘画、跳舞以及现代语言才称得上多才多艺，还有她说话的口气和走路的样子。

yingyinNormal.en: Very good. Drawing on your own experience, I like that. Thanks.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你引述亲身经验非常好。谢谢。

yingyinNormal.en: My maid said you were waiting in here. Everyone else is in the drawing room.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我的女仆说你在这里等着，大家都在客厅。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_family.mean: v. 绘制；勾画；画；拉；拖；拔出；抽出；取出；排出；引出；引起；吸引；激起；以平局结束；使（球）朝预定的目标作弧线运动；（船）吃水；（帆）吃饱风

examination_example.sentence: Dickens wrote to the artist and asked him to correct a <highlight>drawing</highlight> Dickens felt was not faithful enough to his prose.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 狄更斯写信给这位艺术家，要求他修改一副狄更斯认为不够忠实于其散文的画作。

examination_example.sentence: Write an essay of 160-200 words based on the following <highlight>drawing</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 根据下图写一篇160-200字的文章。

word_usage.usage:
drawing作“绘画（艺术）”讲，为不可数名词，如：
I'm not very good at drawing.
我不擅长绘画。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 素描画; 图画; 绘画

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: a picture made using a pencil or pen rather than paint
sense_info_list.zh: 素描画; 图画; 绘画

examination_example.sentence: Cultivating <highlight>drawing</highlight> talent can become an essential tool to improve people's observational skills in fields where the visual is important.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在视觉重要的领域，培养绘画才能可以成为提高人们观察能力的重要工具。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Drawing</highlight> is a skill that requires special training.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 画画是一项需要额外训练的技能。

examination_example.sentence: We mistakenly think of "good" <highlight>drawings</highlight> as those which work as recreations of the real world, as realistic illusions.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们错误地认为“好”的绘画是真实世界的再现，是现实的幻想。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 素描画; 图画; 绘画

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

n. 图画；素描；图表；图样；绘画；制图

examination_example.sentence: A 9-year-old boy named Joe, told not to draw in class, wins a job decorating a restaurant with his <highlight>drawings</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一个叫乔的9岁男孩被告知不要在课堂上画画，他用自己的画赢得了一份装饰餐厅的工作。

examination_example.sentence: But <highlight>drawing</highlight> is definitely what he is most passionate about.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但画画绝对是他最热衷的事情。

examination_example.sentence: I always liked <highlight>drawing</highlight> as early as I can remember, so right from then, I knew what I was going to be.

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

examination_example.sentence: But I don't want to spend a long time looking at kids' <highlight>drawings</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但我不想花太多时间看孩子们的画。

examination_example.sentence: He liked Chibi’s black and white <highlight>drawings</highlight> and put them up on the wall to be admired.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他喜欢赤壁的黑白画，把它们挂在墙上以供欣赏。

examination_example.sentence: First floor: Asian art, African art, Indian art of the Americas, prints and <highlight>drawings</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一楼：亚洲艺术、非洲艺术、美洲印度艺术、版画和素描。
